CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 8, 1955, pg. 9, reads: "Passavant Hospital Practical Nurses Graduation- These graduates of the Kate Estella Koch Practical Nurse School received their diplomas Sept. 30 in First Lutheran Church on Grant Street.  They are now ready to serve as angles of mercy.  Pictured are Sister Margaret Fry, R.N., director of nursing; Virginia A. Lang, R.N., director of school; Sister Margaret Schueder, housemother; Virginia Lang, Anna M. Butler, Irene F. Collett, Margaret M. Dunlap, Mary Jayne Grasswick, Helen McCleary Haines, Grace Harris, Helga R. Hinton, Swanee Judith Hoberg, Barbara Jane Magan, Sara Jane Miller, Robert Dewayne Morder, Wanda Mae Border, Iraletta Elizabeth Nemec, Elizabeth Olexsovich, Lois Cornelia Preisach, Helen Eichleay Siegwarth, Jo Ann F. Tucker, Helen E. Walker and Launa Wilds."
TitMainTitle: Passavant hospital graduating practical nurses and staff including Sister Margaret Fry, Virginia A. Lang, Sister Margaret Schueder, Virginia Lang, Anna M. Butler, Irene F. Collett, Margaret M. Dunlap, Mary Jayne Grasswick, Helen McCleary Haines, Grace Harris, Helga R. Hinton, Swanee Judith Hoberg, Barbara Jane Magan, Sara Jane Miller, Robert Dewayne Morder, Wanda Mae Border, Iraletta Elizabeth Nemec, Elizabeth Olexsovich, Lois Cornelia Preisach, Helen Eichleay Siegwarth, Jo Ann F. Tucker, Helen E. Walker, and Launa Wilds posed in front of altar inside First Lutheran Church.
